creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: brown and off-white; one side decorated with flying bird; opposite side decorated with a lion and a deer; fringed strap fits though loop at other side of bag
dimension: 14 1/2 x 13 1/4 in. (36.83 x 33.66 cm) (pouch only, without strap)
title: Man's bag (morral)
